author: rudolf6
content:
Cross-posting this from the Nimbus Discord (#verkle-trees) to share an update on their early Verkle progress:

> We're in early stages, but progress should be quick thanks to the help we're getting. We're parallelizing work on Banderwagon, IPA, Perdersen commitments, the trie, and tests.

author: rudolf6
content:
Join Verkle Implementers Call tomorrow (Sept 5) at 13:30 UTC for more updates
